name: react-decorate
description: Build composable, stateful decorators for React.

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g HubSpot/react-decorate
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:HubSpot/react-decorate gh-pages --force

author: Colby Rabideau<crabideau@hubspot.com>
